# merchantIdentifier

**Instance Property**

The merchant identifier you registered with Apple for use with Apple Pay.

## Declaration

```swift
required DOMString merchantIdentifier;
```

## Discussion

This is the merchant ID you created and registered with Apple. See [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/configuring-your-environment] for more information.

## Identifier and version information

- **version**: The Apple Pay version supported on your website.

items.description: The Apple Pay version supported on your website.
